segments.text: No , I don't like it very much . Do you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , yes , I do . I'm a real fan of Wanton Marsalis .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , does he play the piano ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , he doesn't ! ! ! He plays the trumpet . So , what kind of music do you like ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The Cranberries . I love their music . How about you ? Do you like them ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , I don't . I can't stand them ! !
segments.speaker: S1
